mention.text: 100 other poor families along the Albacan River in Angeles
a once-bustling city of 280,000 people in the shadow of Mount Pinatubo
director of the Philippine Institute of Volcanology and Seismology
Lisa Hedland , wife of an Air Force sergeant

wife of an Air Force sergeant
Solidad Santiago , a 41-year-old laundry worker from Angeles , who fled to a Manila evacuation center Sunday with most but not all of her family
Santiago , a widow , whose face showed signs of the wrenching fear of the past week `` My oldest son stayed behind to try to guard about 120,000 refugees
; `` nearly 5,000 refugees who crowded Monday into the shaded bleachers of a Manila sports stadium that is being used as an evacuation center .
